The '''Bloodbath announcer''' comes from the [[Build]] game ''[[Blood]]''. It replaces the normal weapon-based [[obituaries]] by random "funny" messages that quite often aim below the belt.
To use the Bloodbath announcer, you simply need to load the file <tt>SOUNDS.RFF</tt> which comes with ''Blood''; and set to ''true'' the [[console variable]] <tt>cl_bbannounce</tt>. [[Category:Features]][[Category:Glossary]]
